definitions.title: n.pl.f.
definitions.body: only cstr. in phr. [[ת חאׁ ֶנְ֑]]([[וֹ]])[[עַשְׁתְּר]] De 7:13, De 28:4, De 28:18, De 28:51 (all ‖[[שְׁגַר אֲלָפֶיְ]]) usu. interpr. either as

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: = young (cf. veneres gregis; in either case with ref. to ‘Aštart as goddess of fecundity; RS:Sem. i. 292, 457 f., 2nd ed. 310, 476 f., adopting

definitions.title: b,
definitions.body: thinks one type of ‘Ašt in Canaan had form of sheep, so Dr:Dt 7, 13); cf. also 9a3=ariy as name of land fertilized by dew and rain We:Skizzen iii. 170.
